name: Dirt Bike Racing Stunts
description:
Are you ready for Crash Stunts Dirt BMX Bike Racing Challenge? Race down beautiful bikes, smashing over rocks, boosting huge jumps as the stunts master of the mountain.

Show off your BMX bicycle Stunt Skills on Impossible tracks of hills and mountains. Race the 2 wheeler bicycle by kicking fast paddle to perform stunts in freestyle. This bicycle game offers adventurous off-road driving experience with perfect cycle simulation.

Game Features:

-Experience the Pleasure of Riding a Mountain Bike!
-Unique Camera Angle for Better Biking Simulation
-Realistic Driving physics for BMX Cycle
-Addictive gameplay and Breathtaking views of High Jumps
-Adventurous Cycle Riding and Tricks, Stunts Hops and Flips
- Do wheelies and BMX Stunts to get extra Score and Bonus Points.
